```{r}

#| label: load-packages

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = F, error = F, message = F, echo = F)

```

```{r}

#| label: read-data

dta0 <- readxl::read_xlsx("/Volumes/g.watt/HL/SMN-risk/secure_data/2024-08-20 Research Hodgkin cohort.xlsx")

```


```{r}

#| label: prepare-outcome-variables

dta1 = dta0 %>% tidyr::unite(
  dob, c(m_birth, y_birth), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  ddx, c(m_diagnose, y_diagnose), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  d_sm1, c(m_smn1, y_smn1), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  d_sm1, c(m_smn2, y_smn2), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  d_sm1, c(m_smn3, y_smn3), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  d_sm1, c(m_smn4, y_smn4), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  d_sm1, c(m_smn5, y_smn5), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  d_sm1, c(m_smn6, y_smn6), sep = "-", remove = F
) %>% tidyr::unite(
  d_sm1, c(m_smn7, y_smn7), sep = "-", remove = F
)
  
  mutate(
  dob = lubridate::parse_date_time(dob, "my"),
  ddx = lubridate::parse_date_time(ddx, "my")
)




%>% filter(
  is.na(dob), # n = 3
  is.na(ddx), # n = 
)
```
